Title: The Command
Writer: Robert Rodat, Robert Moore (based on Robert Moore's book "A Time to Die")
Actors: Matthias Schoenaerts, Léa Seydoux, Peter Simonischek, August Diehl
Plot: The film follows the 2000 K-141 Kursk submarine disaster and the governmental negligence that followed. As the sailors fight for survival, their families desperately battle political obstacles and impossible odds to save them.
Country: France, Belgium, Luxembourg, Romania, Canada, USA
